description: Give your pizza a fresh twist with the addition of zucchini. Ribbons of this green veg are layered on a bed of creamy yoghurt and drizzled with pesto. Yum!
keywords: Vegetable pizza,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Jul 2021
name: Zucchini Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 yellow capsicum, halved, deseeded, cut into strips
0.5 lemon, juiced (plus extra lemon wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fanforced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Roll out each dough ball on a lightly floured surface to form a 24cm oval. Place on trays and spray with oil.
Combine yoghurt, garlic and thyme in a small bowl. Spread mixture over pizza bases. Top with mozzarella and capsicum, then bake for 12 minutes or until edges are golden.

Meanwhile, place zucchini and lemon juice in a bowl and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Remove pizzas from oven and transfer to a board. Arrange zucchini mixture on top. Dollop with pesto. Scatter over basil leaves and season with pepper. Serve with lemon wedges.
